title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.4 - Billing and collection of premiums
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 450.4 - Billing and collection of premiums

State Regulations

Premium bills shall be rendered in an appropriate manner as
provided in the policy contract, to policyholders of the amount due the State

Fund as advance or deposit premiums and earned premiums. Failure of the assured
to pay such bills when due may warrant cancellation of the policy as provided
by law and reference of the account to the legal department for appropriate
action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
450.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
